bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Rail Transit Vehicle Event Recorders
IEEE Standard for Rail Transit Vehicle Event Recorders

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: On-board devices/systems, with crashworthy memory, that record data to support accident/incident analysis for rail transit vehicles, are covered. The requirements of this standard are limited to event recorder functions and interfaces. Data transmission methods are excluded. The information in this standard is independent of the hardware and/or software employed for other vehicle systems.
